member.name: P:Volo.Abp.MultiTenancy.AbpMultiTenancyOptions.IsEnabled
member.summary: A central point to enable/disable multi-tenancy. Default: false.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.MultiTenancy.BasicTenantInfo.TenantId
member.summary: Null indicates the host. Not null value for a tenant.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.MultiTenancy.BasicTenantInfo.Name
member.summary: Name of the tenant if is not null.

member.name: M:Volo.Abp.MultiTenancy.ITenantResolver.ResolveTenantIdOrNameAsync

member.returns: Tenant id, unique name or null (if could not resolve).
